revision.comment: /* External links */ Added the Zandronum wiki link
revision.text:
{{Doomwiki}}'''Zandronum''' is a [[source port]] which serves as the continuation and replacement of [[Skulltag]]. The name is a mash-up of "Andromeda" and "Infernum", two proposals that were being debated, prefixed with a Z for [[ZDoom]].
The main difference between Skulltag and Zandronum is that the data pack (containing additional textures, monsters, items, and maps) is no longer automatically loaded.
<!-- Follow the ZDoom Wiki's standard for simplicity; Using Zandronum - informational --> == Using Zandronum == * [[Command line parameters|Command Line Parameters (CLI)]] * Environment and Game Settings ** [[Zandronum: DMFlags|DMFlags]] ** [[Zandronum: LMSFlags|LMSFlags]]
<!-- Follow the ZDoom Wiki's standard for simplicity; Modding for Zandronum - modding documentation --> == Modding for Zandronum == * [[Zandronum: ACS|ACS]] * [[ANCRINFO|Announcers]] * [[BOTINFO|Bots]] * [[CMPGNINF|Campaign]] * [[Database]] * [[SECTINFO|Sector Info.]] * [[SKININFO|Skins]] * [[VOTEDEF|Custom Votes]] * [[Zandronum: MENUDEF|MENUDEF]] * [[Zandronum: DECORATE|DECORATE]] * [[GAMEMODE]]
== See also == *[[Zandronum features]]
